RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso

RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso Class Reference

#include <gscreateperso.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The character creation.

Here the user can create its own character. As the widgets are dynamically create from xml files, the difficulty is to handle the events. The events are kept by their ID (nextIrrID start at 1000), a boolean value saying if it must be roll again and a value for their tAttributeType.

tAttributeType RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::getAttType ( tAttributeListItem *  item  )  [private]

Get the type of an attribute.

In a tAttributeListItem, the type is a const char*. According to this string, we returning type as a tAttributeType using strcmp().

Parameters:
item The attribute we want the type
Returns:
The type of the given attribute

tCategoryTab * RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::getCategoryByName ( const char *  na  )  [private]

Return a category by its name.

The struct tCategoryTab contains the name of the category (field name). For all category in tabMap, we test with strcmp() if the name is the same as given. If it is, we return the corresponding tCategoryTab. Otherwise we return NULL.

Parameters:
na The name of the category to get.
Returns:
The named category if found, otherwise returns NULL

s32 RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::getNextY ( tCategoryTab *  tab  )  [private]

Get the NextY value of the given category.

This function is needed because the recursive own/ownerTab case.

Parameters:
tab The tab to treat.
Returns:
the nextY value of the given category or its ownerTab.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::increaseTabNextY ( tCategoryTab *  tab,
s32  i 
) [private]

Increase the nextY value of the given tCategoryTab.

If the given category is drawn in its own tab (tab->own=true) we increase its nextY value. Otherwise, we increase its ownerTab nextY value. It is a recursive function.

Parameters:
tab The category to modify.
i The value to add to the nextY value.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::init (  )  [virtual]

The constructor of the game state.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::pause (  )  [virtual]

Pause the game GameState.

It will stop the Irrlicht Device timer and disable the player's camera input. You may call resume() to continue playing.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::resume (  )  [virtual]

Resume the game after a pause() call.

It reinitialize the erGame event receiver, send it to the Irrlicht device and set the mouse cursor invisible.

void RainbruRPG::Core::gsCreatePerso::run (  )  [virtual]

The drawing method.

This method is called by the GameEngine for each frame. It just calls the Irrlicht draw function. It also calls the drawDebug() method if debug is set to true.
